name: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty server farm - VMware vSphere
description: This template deploys a server farm topology of WebSphere Application Server Liberty on 2 Linux virtual machines.

metadata.longDescription: This template deploys a server farm topology of WebSphere Application Server Liberty on 2 Linux virtual machines.

bullets.title: Operating Systems Supported
bullets.description:
• Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
  • Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6
  • Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Ubuntu 14.04 LTS

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
1. Liberty server - Central Node
  2. Liberty server - Application Node

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
  2. Installation is via Installation Manager, please ensure this has been correctly installed on the repo server.
  3. Modify the libertynode_was_liberty_edition variable in CAM variables to change the installation type to base, core or nd.
  4. The plugin is generated on all nodes and merged on the Central node.
  5. IBM Knowledge Center for WAS Liberty - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSEQTP_liberty/as_ditamaps/was900_welcome_liberty.html
  6. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
